data.name: Autodesk Forum Improvements
data.description: After the recent forum "upgrades" many users and myself created different styles to bring back some usability and better looks. This style combines a few people's work to remove extra white space and color pinned, unread, and answered posts.

data.name: AllanPls for Path of Exile Trade
data.description: A Poe.Trade-inspired style for the official Path of Exile Trade website (pathofexile.com/trade) ---------- Version 0.1.4 onwards will no longer be updated via userstyles.org due to the security reasons from Stylish which is the default suggested extension here, please follow the official GitHub repo (https://github.com/survfate/AllanPls) for any future update 7/23 UPDATE: Since I found out that Stylus support userstyles.org, I have decided to continue support userstyles.org, however please make sure that you have Stylus and not Stylish installed
